competitors.name: Pipedrive

2020.context: Salesforce, Inc. is a enterprise cloud software company focused on CRM, marketing, commerce, and enterprise AI platform. Acquired Slack for $27.7B. Work from anywhere.

competitors.name: SAP
competitors.notes: Nearest competitor with 5.3% market share as of mid-2020

competitors.name: Microsoft Dynamics 365
competitors.notes: Second largest market share, integrates with Office 365

competitors.name: Oracle NetSuite
competitors.notes: Unified all-in-one commerce solution for sales, marketing, operations

competitors.name: HubSpot
competitors.notes: 86,000 customers vs Salesforce's 150,000+. 400% increase in new customers after price cuts. Growing fast.

competitors.name: Zoho CRM
competitors.notes: Cloud-based, works for all organization sizes, free version for up to 3 users

competitors.name: Adobe Experience Cloud
competitors.notes: Strong cloud focus, gaining market share

competitors.name: monday.com
competitors.notes: Won 2020 Webby Award for Productivity

competitors.name: ActiveCampaign
competitors.notes: Marketing automation and sales CRM for small businesses

2024.context: Salesforce, Inc. is a enterprise cloud software company focused on CRM, marketing, commerce, and enterprise AI platform. Einstein GPT and Agentforce AI. Data Cloud growth.

competitors.name: Microsoft Dynamics 365
competitors.notes: Closest rival, CRM+ERP suite with Copilot AI. Seamless integration with Outlook, Teams, Excel.

competitors.name: Oracle
competitors.notes: Legacy giant, leveraging OCI for competitive AI pricing

competitors.name: SAP
competitors.notes: Legacy giant fighting to keep ERP customers

competitors.name: HubSpot
competitors.notes: Dominates SMB segment. 'Breeze AI' competes with Salesforce Agentforce. Free CRM tier.

competitors.name: Zoho CRM
competitors.notes: 250,000+ businesses across 180 countries. Affordable and customizable.

competitors.name: Freshworks
competitors.notes: Alternative for 2025

competitors.name: Creatio
competitors.notes: No-code CRM platform

competitors.name: Zendesk
competitors.notes: Service-focused CRM

competitors.name: Pegasystems
competitors.notes: Enterprise alternative

competitors.name: Monday.com
competitors.notes: Work management CRM

2025.query: Salesforce CRM competitors 2025 enterprise SaaS competitive landscape
2025.context: Salesforce, Inc. is a enterprise cloud software company focused on CRM, marketing, commerce, and enterprise AI platform. Enterprise AI platform. Competing with Microsoft, Oracle.

competitors.name: Microsoft Dynamics 365
competitors.notes: Strong competitor with deep integration into Microsoft ecosystem (Office 365, Teams, Azure), particularly attractive for organizations already invested in Microsoft technologies

competitors.name: Oracle CX Cloud
competitors.notes: Enterprise-focused with strong database and ERP integration capabilities, preferred by companies using Oracle infrastructure

competitors.name: SAP Customer Experience (SAP CX)
competitors.notes: Popular among companies already using SAP ERP systems, offering tight integration with SAP's business suite

competitors.name: HubSpot
competitors.notes: Strong in mid-market and growing into enterprise segment, known for marketing automation and user-friendly interface

competitors.name: Adobe Experience Cloud
competitors.notes: Particularly strong in marketing and customer experience management, focused on digital experience

competitors.name: Zoho CRM
competitors.notes: Cost-effective alternative with comprehensive suite of business tools, targeting SMB and mid-market

competitors.name: ServiceNow
competitors.notes: Growing presence in customer service and workflow automation, expanding beyond ITSM

competitors.name: Freshworks (Freshsales)
competitors.notes: Targeting SMB and mid-market with AI-powered features and affordable pricing

competitors.name: Zendesk
competitors.notes: Strong in customer service/support CRM functions with focus on customer experience

competitors.name: Monday.com Sales CRM
competitors.notes: Emerging player with user-friendly interface and visual workflow management
